docblock.description: The Clico Row class is utilized by the Table class.
docblock.long-description: It souldn't need to be accessed directly. It it used to fill Tables.

docblock.description: Constructor. Can optionally set the values of the columns
Adds a column to the Row
Sets the widths of each column to fit within `$maxWidth`
Get the character (decorated) used to separate the header row from the body
Get the character (decorated) used to separate this row from other.
docblock.long-description: This will return either the `headerLineCharacter` or the `rowLineCharacter`

docblock.description: Get the character (decorated) used to separate columns
Get the character (decorated) used to separate body rows
Get the number of columns wide
Check if this Row is the header row
Set this Row as the Table header
Set the (decorated) character used to separate the header row from the body
Set the (decorated) character used to separate columns
Set the (decorated) charater used to separate body rows
Make the row not the header
Make all columns in the row the same height (stretch shorter columns)

docblock.description: The Clico Table class allows for formatting tabular data for the CLI stdOut.
docblock.long-description: It utilizes the Text class to allow for decorating text for the CLI stdOut.
A catch-all used to send Text decoration methods down to table column(s)
Can optionally populate the data. Can optionally set the first row of data as the header row.

docblock.description: Render the entire table using Text instances

docblock.long-description: Add a header row. Unsets the previous header row.

docblock.description: Target a specific cell for text decoration
Target an entire column for text decoration
Fit all columns to the table (width and height)

docblock.long-description: Get the character (decorated) used to separate the header row from the body

docblock.description: Get the number of rows high

docblock.long-description: Get the character (decorated) used to separate columns
Get the character (decorated) used to separate body rows

docblock.description: Get the number of columns wide

docblock.long-description: Reformat Rows' and Columns' widths, heights, and separation characters as necessary. Optionally add rows of data to the table

docblock.description: Target an entire row for text decoration
Make the first row the header row

docblock.long-description: Set the character used to separate the header row from the body
Set the character used to separate columns
Set the charater used to separate body rows

docblock.description: Push the separation characters down to the rows

docblock.description: The Clico Text class allows for text decorating for the CLI stdOut.
docblock.long-description: Text and backgrounds can be coloured; text weight can be set as well as Other effects such as blinking, highlighting, and underlining.
Can optionally set the text on instantiation.
Direct future colour methods to affect the background colour.
Set the colour (background or foreground) to black
Set the colour (background or foreground) to blue
Set the colour (background or foreground) to cyan
Make future colour assignments their dark variant

docblock.description: Make the last assigned colour dark
docblock.long-description: Make the most recent colour assignment (background/foreground) its dark variant.
Direct future colour methods to affect the foreground colour.
Set the colour (background or foreground) to green
Make the text highlighted (invert background and foregroune colours)

docblock.description: Get the length of the undecorated string

docblock.long-description: Make future colour assignments their light variant

docblock.description: Make the last assigned colour light
docblock.long-description: Make the most recent colour assignment (background/foreground) its light variant.
Set the colour (background or foreground) to magenta
Set the colour (background or foreground) to red

docblock.description: Repeat the text property when rendering
Set the active colour property to its default.
docblock.long-description: Pass $setAll = true to set both the background and foreground colours to their default.
Set the colour (background or foreground) to white/grey
Set the colour (background or foreground) to yellow

docblock.description: The index of available colours and their numeric values

docblock.description: The Clico Column class is utilized by the Table and Row classes.
docblock.long-description: It souldn't need to be accessed directly. It it used to fill Rows.

docblock.description: Constructor. Sets the `$text` property on instantiation.
Gets the height of the column (number of lines)
Returns all of the lines of text, undecorated
Gets the width of the column in characters
Set the column width in characters
Add additional blank lines to the end of the column
Split the `$text` property into substrings to fit within the set width
